title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Critical Assumption Prompt Learning for Causal Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of natural language processing, pretrained language models, and machine learning fundamentals
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify causal relationships between two events within a text with over 80% accuracy through prompt-based learning
Learners achieve performance improvements of over 15% compared to existing prompt models by applying the DAPrompt methodology
Learners can implement a methodology to evaluate causal assumptions through masked token probability analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
